TEI.2.document_title: J Antonio Padilla to Governor Viesca, 05-13-1830

barker_notes.barker_summary: J. A. Padilla to Governor Viesca, Nacogdoches, May 13, 1830. His arrest on charge of murder.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 374

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*J. A. Padilla to Governor Viesca, Nacogdoches, May 13, 1830. His arrest on charge of murder.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p*[Discussing his arrest on a charge of murder, May 13, 1830.]*/p*
